metadata.title: CVE-2014-3423 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: lisp/net/browse-url.el in GNU Emacs 24.3 and earlier allows local users tooverwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/Mosaic.#####temporary file.

criterions.comment: xemacs21-packages: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
emacs23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
emacs24: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
